title: 都来分享下自己服务器的启动代码(雾)
author: 这里小雨.
txt_content:
本帖最后由 LaoguaB 于 2020-7-18 10:11 编辑 

我集合了两个帖子的优化教程 然后把参数全都加上去了
除了开头结尾我都看不懂(雾)
java -Xmx%max_ram%G -Xms%min_ram%G -server -agentlib:MCPAntiAttack -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseCompressedOops -XX:+UseCMSCompactAtFullCollection -XX:+UseFastAccessorMethods -XX:ParallelGCThreads=4 -XX:ParallelGCThreads=4 -XX:CMSFullGCsBeforeCompaction=2 -XX:CMSInitiatingOccupancyFraction=70 -XX:-DisableExplicitGC -XX:TargetSurvivorRatio=90 -XX:-DisableExplicitGC -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=100 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:TargetSurvivorRatio=90 -XX:G1NewSizePercent=50 -XX:G1MaxNewSizePercent=80 -XX:G1MixedGCLiveThresholdPercent=35 -XX:+AlwaysPreTouch -XX:+ParallelRefProcEnabled -Dusing.aikars.flags=mcflags.emc.gs -jar %jar_name%
